isos.label: Ubuntu
isos.config:
deb https://{domain}/ubuntu/ {version} main restricted universe multiverse
deb-src http://{domain}/ubuntu/ {version} main restricted universe multiverse
deb https://{domain}/ubuntu/ {version}-updates main restricted universe multiverse
deb-src http://{domain}/ubuntu/ {version}-updates main restricted universe multiverse
deb https://{domain}/ubuntu/ {version}-backports main restricted universe multiverse
deb-src http://{domain}/ubuntu/ {version}-backports main restricted universe multiverse
deb https://{domain}/ubuntu/ {version}-security main restricted universe multiverse
deb-src http://{domain}/ubuntu/ {version}-security main restricted universe multiverse
# Not recommended
# deb https://{domain}/ubuntu/ {version}-proposed main restricted universe multiverse
# deb-src http://{domain}/ubuntu/ {version}-proposed main restricted universe multiverse

isos.label: CentOS
isos.config:
[base]
name=CentOS-$releasever - Base
#mirrorlist=http://mirrorlist.centos.org/?release=$releasever&arch=$basearch&repo=os
baseurl=https://{domain}/centos/$releasever/os/$basearch/
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://{domain}/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-{version}
#released updates
[updates]
name=CentOS-$releasever - Updates
# mirrorlist=http://mirrorlist.centos.org/?release=$releasever&arch=$basearch&repo=updates
baseurl=https://{domain}/centos/$releasever/updates/$basearch/
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://{domain}/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-{version}
#additional packages that may be useful
[extras]
name=CentOS-$releasever - Extras
# mirrorlist=http://mirrorlist.centos.org/?release=$releasever&arch=$basearch&repo=extras
baseurl=https://{domain}/centos/$releasever/extras/$basearch/
gpgcheck=1
gpgkey=https://{domain}/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-{version}
#additional packages that extend functionality of existing packages
[centosplus]
name=CentOS-$releasever - Plus
# mirrorlist=http://mirrorlist.centos.org/?release=$releasever&arch=$basearch&repo=centosplus
baseurl=https://{domain}/centos/$releasever/centosplus/$basearch/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=0
gpgkey=https://{domain}/centos/RPM-GPG-KEY-CentOS-{version}

isos.label: Debian
isos.config:
deb https://{domain}/debian/ {version} main contrib non-free
deb-src https://{domain}/debian/ {version} main contrib non-free
deb https://{domain}/debian/ {version}-updates main contrib non-free
deb-src https://{domain}/debian/ {version}-updates main contrib non-free
deb https://{domain}/debian/ {version}-backports main contrib non-free
deb-src https://{domain}/debian/ {version}-backports main contrib non-free
deb https://{domain}/debian-security/ {version}/updates main contrib non-free
deb-src https://{domain}/debian-security/ {version}/updates main contrib non-free
